version.description: Prints just the compiler's version and exits.

description: Optimizes the module. Also has the usual shorthands:
-O     Uses defaults. Equivalent to -O2s
-O0    Equivalent to --optimizeLevel 0
-O1    Equivalent to --optimizeLevel 1
-O2    Equivalent to --optimizeLevel 2
-O3    Equivalent to --optimizeLevel 3
-Oz    Equivalent to -O but with --shrinkLevel 2
-O3s   Equivalent to -O3 with --shrinkLevel 1 etc.

optimizeLevel.description: How much to focus on optimizing code. [0-3]

shrinkLevel.description: How much to focus on shrinking code size. [0-2, s=1, z=2]

validate.description: Validates the module using Binaryen. Exits if invalid.

baseDir.description: Specifies the base directory of input and output files.

outFile.description: Specifies the output file. File extension indicates format.

tsdFile.description: Specifies the TypeScript definition output file (.d.ts).

description: Enables source map generation. Optionally takes the URL
used to reference the source map from the binary file.

debug.description: Enables debug information in emitted binaries.

noAssert.description: Replaces assertions with just their value without trapping.

noEmit.description: Performs compilation as usual but does not emit code.

importMemory.description: Imports the memory instance provided by the embedder.

sharedMemory.description: Declare memory as shared by settings the max shared memory.

memoryBase.description: Sets the start offset of compiler-generated static memory.

importTable.description: Imports the function table instance provided by the embedder.

noLib.description: Does not include the shipped standard library.

description: Adds one or multiple paths to custom library components and
uses exports of all top-level files at this path as globals.
Aliases a global object under another name, e.g., to switch
the default 'Math' implementation used: --use Math=JSMath
Sets the trap mode to use.
allow  Allow trapping operations. This is the default.
clamp  Replace trapping operations with clamping semantics.
js     Replace trapping operations with JS semantics.
Specifies additional Binaryen passes to run after other
optimizations, if any. See: Binaryen/src/passes/pass.cpp
Enables additional (experimental) WebAssembly features.
sign-extension  Enables sign-extension operations
mutable-global  Enables mutable global imports and exports
bulk-memory     Enables bulk memory operations
simd            Enables SIMD types and operations.
threads         Enables threading and atomic operations.

transform.description: Specifies the path to a custom transform to 'require'.

measure.description: Prints measuring information on I/O and compile times.

....description: Specifies node.js options (CLI only). See: node --help
